# Factorio Agent Report - Steps 0-7

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steam Power Generation at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) to (x=0.5, y=6.5)
Generates electricity using steam power.
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) extracting water.
- Boiler at (x=-5.0, y=2.5) consuming coal (manually inserted) and water to produce steam.
- Steam Engine at (x=0.5, y=6.5) consuming steam to generate electricity.
- PipeGroup connecting the Offshore Pump to the Boiler (fluid_system=7906).
- PipeGroup connecting the Boiler to the Steam Engine (fluid_system=7908).

### Crude Oil Extraction and Storage at (x=17.5, y=40.5) to (x=25.5, y=43.5)
Extracts crude oil from the ground and stores it. Powered by the steam power generation setup.
Consists of the following entities:
- Pumpjack at (x=17.5, y=40.5) extracting crude oil.
- Storage Tank at (x=25.5, y=43.5) storing crude oil.
- PipeGroup connecting the Pumpjack to the Storage Tank (fluid_system=7910).
- ElectricityGroup (id=18213) connecting the Steam Engine to the Pumpjack via Small Electric Poles (positions omitted for brevity).

### Basic Oil Refining at (x=30.5, y=63.5) to (x=40.5, y=66.5)
Refines crude oil into petroleum gas using basic oil processing. Powered by the steam power generation setup.
Consists of the following entities:
- Oil Refinery at (x=30.5, y=63.5) set to 'basic-oil-processing'.
- Storage Tank at (x=40.5, y=66.5) storing the output petroleum gas.
